channel.title: Removing interface?

item.title: Removing interface?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

im saying that:

if you are attacking someone then they barrage you and walk/run away you will not be in the same area, you will run after them and continue to attack.

if you get barraged and they start to farcast you can simply right click then click attack and you will move to them and start attacking.

if you get barraged you can click follow… and then you will start to follow the person.

if you get barraged you CANNOT click the minimap or anywhere on the screen to move, you must do one of the things listed above.

i was wondering if i could make it that if you are frozen that the choice to attack and the choice to follow someone will be removed. Also, if you are already attacking someone then you will stop attacking until you are un frozen.

make sense now?

Read full topic

item.title: Removing interface?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

well it does freeze but if you click attack or follow on someone then you will be able to move to attack them or follow them. And also if you are already attacking the person who barraged you then you will continue to attack them no matter where they run. Barrage freezes only to a certain extent. You cannot click on the minimap to walk or click on the screen to walk but you CAN do what i said above. I am trying to prevent this from happening.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing interface?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

I’m not sure if this is considered an interface but i want some help with a code that will make barrage freeze (in a way) on Deltascape based sources.

i was thinking of a code like:

if (freezetimer > 10) { //remove the attack and follow choice //stop attacking, maybe the code will be attack = false; not sure. }

is there anyway to do this?

Read full topic
